{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Desay <!-- Desay A&V Science and Technology --> |model=DS-B052 |revision= |asin= |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |availability=OEM |est_release_date= |fcc_date=07/26/2009 |fcc_id=XJGDS0001 |pcb_id= |type=Blu-ray player |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=AC, corded |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |cpu1_brand= |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1= |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model= |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Arcadyan WN7522C 1 |wi1_module_if=USB (non-standard connector) |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43231 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=Blu-ray drive, HDMI, A/V out, Component out |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} :;[[Desay A&V Science and Technology DS-B052]] Blu-ray Disc Player
The SoC is covered by a heatsink and is unidentifiable in the FCC photos.
This is the parent OEM product for the following Blu-ray players.. *[[Insignia NS-WBRDVD]] • [[VIZIO VBR200W]] • [[VIZIO VBR210]]
"P/N: 14175222"... is silkscreened on the wireless module. :The wireless module is an [[Arcadyan WN7522C 1]]. The wireless module is covered in a plastic shell (which looks much like :the shell used on the [[Toshiba WLM-10UB1]] [another [[Arcadyan]] device]) :which is then exposed out of a hole in the back of the device.
